tool_description: Selects HTML elements using CSS selectors or XPath expressions, with options for multiple matches and attribute extraction.

selector_type.description: Type of selector: css or xpath

find_all.description: Whether to find all matches or just the first

extract_attributes.description: HTML attributes to extract from selected elements

error_messages: Invalid HTML content: Provide valid HTML content to parse
Invalid selector syntax: Check CSS selector or XPath expression syntax
Selector type not supported: Use 'css' or 'xpath' as selector_type
No elements found: None of the provided selectors matched any elements
Attribute not found: One or more requested attributes don't exist on selected elements
usage: Provide HTML content and CSS selectors or XPath expressions to extract specific elements. Optionally extract attributes and control whether to find all matches.

extracted_attributes.description: Values of requested attributes from selected elements
